scenario1_100k_thread_scaling.description: Scenario 1 (individual inserts) with 100KB payload across thread scaling: 2, 5, 10, 100, 500 threads. 100 iterations each. Expected throughput: ~1,000-1,200 ops/sec based on previous results.

scenario2_100k_thread_scaling.description: Scenario 2 (batch inserts) with 100KB payload - EXPERIMENTAL: Previous tests showed Scenario 2 doesn't work with 100KB payloads. This may fail or timeout, especially at higher thread counts. 100 iterations each. If failures occur, consider reducing batch size (count) to 5 or even 1.
